GoodBye04: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I am glad to have seen you again.
GoodBye01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:LaughS_00>I heard tell there was a cave that housed
a <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff> in this area, but all of my
searching has come to naught.
Perhaps someone else has caused the
beast to move on...<sp:5:0:0>leaving me to grapple
with my greatest foe yet—free time.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I've got it!<sp:5:1:0> While you're here, why don't
I regale you with tales of the numerous
cave creatures I've matched mettle with?
You are an adventurer, are you not? I'm
certain you'll find my stories educational!
Talk00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Be sure to take care as you journey into a
cave. You might find your path blocked by
monsters known as <clr:0000>Horriblins<clr:ffff>.
Each has a unique, <clr:0000>hammer-shaped horn<clr:ffff>
atop its head.<sp:5:0:0> The stronger the variant,
the <clr:0000>larger and tougher<clr:ffff> the horn.
Should you face off against these beasts,
it would serve you well to make careful
note of their horns.
Talk01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Have you had the displeasure of
encountering a <clr:0000>Like Like<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>These loathsome monsters swallow up
anyone who gets too close, <clr:0000>stealing their
swords and shields<clr:ffff> in the process.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Clever hunters like myself know that the
beast's <clr:0000>weak point is the tongue in its
maw<clr:ffff>, but opportunities to strike it are few.
They're troublesome foes indeed... But
my last encounter with one offered some
food for thought.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I was searching through a cave when an
unnoticed Like Like attacked me from my
blind spot.
The sudden strike rattled my composure,
and I tried to fend it off with the <clr:0000>torch<clr:ffff>
I had on hand.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>The torch ignited the beast.<sp:5:1:0> As the fire
spread across its body, it let out a groan,
exposing its tongue!
Though I can only speak to my own
experience,<sp:5:1:0> it seems <clr:0000>the creature may
well be weak to fire<clr:ffff>.
It might be worth testing that theory
yourself next time you run into one.
GoodBye01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:LaughS_00>They say a <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff> lurks in cave near
here, but my search proved fruitless.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now that I've lost my prey, I find myself
with an abundance of free time. Might I
tell you another cave-monster tale?
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The equipment-stealing <clr:0000>Like Like<clr:ffff> does not
readily show its <clr:0000>weak point—its tongue<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>But when, by chance, I set fire to one's
body, it groaned and stuck out its tongue.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_00><clr:0000>They may well be weak to fire.<clr:ffff><sp:5:1:0> Should you
encounter one in a cave, give it a try.
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>We've discussed <clr:0000>Like Likes <clr:ffff>before, but
did you know that different types exist?<sp:0:4:0>Why, I recently encountered one that
<clr:0000>spat rocks out of its mouth<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>And if that weren't troublesome enough,
the beast's body was covered in rocks! It
shrugged off even my respectable strikes.
I had no choice but to turn my back upon
that rocky tyrant and flee the cave as fast
as I could.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> How thrilling it would have been to
send those rocks the creature spat <clr:0000>back
the way they came<clr:ffff>...
Talk02_01:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:ffff>All <clr:0000>Like Likes <clr:ffff>are troublesome, but the
variant that spits rocks may be the worst
I've yet encountered.
Its body is covered in stone so tough that
even my mighty strikes had no effect.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>If only I could <clr:0000>send the rocks the creature
spat back the way they came<clr:ffff>...
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Heh...<sp:5:0:0> That wasn't even a warm-up for
you, was it? It's written all over your face.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>I appreciate the rescue, but it was
hardly necessary for a foe like that.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You've got some skill.<sp:5:1:0> They hardly posed
a challenge to you, let alone a threat.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not bad!<sp:5:1:0> But I can tell you're capable of
so much more...
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The way you fought just now...<sp:5:0:0>
I'm impressed!<sp:5:1:0> I could learn much
from your approach to combat.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That was beautiful! <sp:5:0:0>A tremendous show
of skill!<sp:5:0:0> I had high expectations, but
consider me stunned.
Talk99_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hi there!<sp:5:1:0> We meet again!<sp:5:1:0> My search for
the elusive <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff> continues.
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>How embarrassing to be done in by a
monster...<sp:5:1:0> Please, leave me to my shame.
Away, away!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You want to help? Heh. <sp:5:0:0>A situation such
as this hardly warrants it, but I'm grateful
for the sentiment!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>If you're intent on fighting, I won't stop
you...<sp:5:1:0>but this monster may be more than
we can handle!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Painful_00>What an embarrassment on my part...<sp:5:1:0> I'm
not lagging behind some monster, surely!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As you can see, I'm a little tied up with
this monster situation.<sp:5:0:0> If you want to talk,
it'll have to wait until later!
GoodBye00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Though I may not look it, I am a monster
hunter of some small renown.

I spend my days traveling the lands of
Hyrule in pursuit of a myriad of prey.

At the request of a fellow named <clr:0000>Koltin<clr:ffff>,
I'm presently hunting <clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>
mysterious, cave-dwelling creatures.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I've heard that one such beast lurks in a
cave in <clr:0000>this very region<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The question is, which cave?
Talk03_00:
My search for <clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs <clr:ffff>yet continues,
as per <clr:0000>Koltin's<clr:ffff> request.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though admittedly, the Bubbulfrog rumor
is running somewhat dry. <sp:5:0:0>Worse still, my
client seems to have disappeared.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>But a hunter must make opportunities out
of obstacles! I'll be searching the cave for
glowing mushrooms and exploding fruit.
<snd:LaughS_00>That way I'll be prepared for any monster
I may encounter!
Talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>If my tales aid you in any way, I'll be glad
for it!<sp:5:1:0> Well then, fellow traveler,<sp:5:0:0> let us
hope our paths will cross again!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>An uncharacteristic blunder on my part.<sp:5:1:0>
Perhaps the most powerful enemy of all
is carelessness...
GoodBye01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm glad our paths have crossed yet again.<sp:5:1:0>
Our conversations are a highlight of my
continued hunt for the <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>.
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I do not know where <clr:0000>Koltin<clr:ffff> has gone.
He's the one who hired me to seek out
the <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>So for the time being, I've decided to
polish my skills as a monster hunter by
exploring different caves.
In addition to monsters to fight, caves are
filled with nourishing mushrooms and fish.
It's all a hunter could ever need.
Talk04_00:
The whereabouts of my former client
<clr:0000>Koltin <clr:ffff>may be unknown, but that will not
deter me from exploring every cave I find.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>My next goal is challenging the Depths...
<sp:5:1:0>There dwell monsters stronger than any
found in the caves.
Every cave I visit is a new opportunity to
train. When I finally do enter the Depths,
I want to be ready for anything.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>Perhaps our journeys will converge again.
<sp:5:1:0>Until then, take care!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Perhaps it's fate that we were to fight
together like this.<sp:0:4:0>Your bravery deserves a reward.<sp:5:0:0> Take it!
Talk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You're clearly becoming just as
indomitable an adventurer as I am.<sp:0:4:0>If there is nowhere left to challenge us
on the surface, then perhaps we've no
choice but to take on the Depths.
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Your battle prowess deserves a show of
appreciation. <sp:5:1:0>Please, I insist!
GoodBye00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I could just determine which cave it's
hiding in, slaying the <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff> would
be simplicity itself!<sp:5:0:0>
But until I find that all-important cave,
I cannot demonstrate my worth.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's supposed to be somewhere nearby
too... Perhaps I'll search more thoroughly
after I've rested my mind and body.
GoodBye01_00:
Reports of a Bubbulfrog sighting in a
nearby cave drew me to this area.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>But I cannot find the cave in question.<sp:5:1:0>
It should be <clr:0000>close<clr:ffff>, but alas, the report
was less detailed than one might hope.
Hmph. Confounded <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> It must
have heard I was coming for it and hidden
itself away somewhere.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>But on my reputation as a monster hunter,
I swear I will bring it to light!
Talk00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Here's one...<sp:5:1:0> Have you heard of the beast
known as the <clr:0000>Horriblin<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>They're a recently discovered monster,
making their nefarious lairs in caves
across the land.
<snd:Chat_01>Of particular note is their distinctive,
<clr:0000>hammer-shaped horn<clr:ffff>.

Horriblins come in a variety of colors,
each with their <clr:0000>own horn shape<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>The horns of stronger varieties tend to be
larger and tougher. Perhaps there's some
way to put those horns to use...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Should you ever find yourself
face-to-wretched-face with a Horriblin,
be sure to observe it carefully.
Talk99: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hi there!<sp:5:1:0> Are you a traveling adventurer?
